segments.text: Why didn ’ t you call me last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why didn ’ t you phone me from a callboy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn ’ t have any change .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me why you didn ’ t come to see me tonight then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t like all your questions . That ’ s why .
segments.speaker: S2
